name: Tsuri Spirits: Tsutte Asoberu Suizokukan
summary: Tsuri Spirits: Tsutte Asoberu Suizokukan is a top-down over-the-top fishing video medal game. The game is set within an aquatic theme park, with players participating in attractions using their own customizable avatar (reminiscent of those from the Animal Crossing series). As players earn more medals, they can spend them to not only upgrade the medal games, but also acquire fish for the park's explorable exotic aquarium.
